DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test a specific nerve stimulation protocol as therapeutic option in patients diagnosed with CRPS (complex regional pain syndrome) of the upper extremity.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Repetitive Electric Sensory Stimulation (RSS) as Intervention in Complex-regional-pain-syndrome Type I (CRPS)
DOC.detailed_description: A specific high frequency electric stimulation is conveyed at 5 days to the affected hand. Each stimulation session lasts 45 minutes.
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with CRPS Type I intolerable hyperalgesia lesions at the fingertips high grade digit contracture central neurologic disorders psychiatric disorders
